meaning: The 6 attributes of prosperity, beauty, fame, power, knowledge and dispassion are together are known as Bhaga (soubhagya). The Goddess who showers these is known as Bhagawati.The Supreme Mother as Bhagawati showers auspiciousness on Her devotees.
commentary: Aiśwaryasya samagrasya viryasya yashaha sriyahjnāna-vairagyayos caiva śannam bhaga itingana
